title: Drawing, "Green Leaves and Roses on Lattice, Wallpaper Design", 1940–50
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper
inscribed: On verso in terracotta crayon, lower right:  Tommi Parzinger/320 East 57th St/N.Y.C./Design/#125
description:
Dense green leaf pattern over white lattice on blue ground and large pink rose at center. Three loose corners (1998-19-134-b/d) with matching roses. 

Four corners cut out, three of which are located in an envelope with the drawing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Green Leaves and Roses on Lattice, Wallpaper Design", 1940–50.
1940–50. Brush and gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-134-a/d.
